All Implemented Interfaces:
com.serotonin.io.messaging.MessageParser
public class RtuMessageParser
extends BaseMessageParser

Message parser implementation for RTU encoding. Primary reference for the ordering of CRC bytes. Also provides handling of incomplete messages.

Author:
mlohbihler
